sense.def:
To leave an imprint on someone's mind or on a place
pomeni imeti močan vpliv na človekovo mišljenje ali na neki kraj.

seg.quote: These things have left a deep imprint on our thinking.
The town still bears the imprint of its industrial origins.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is imprinted on one's memory
, tistega ne moremo pozabiti.

seg.quote: This sunset will be forever imprinted in my mind.

sense.def:
An imprint
je znamenje, ki ga naredi pritisk predmeta na neko površino.

seg.quote: In its centre was the imprint of his hand.

sense.def:
Kadar neki predmet
is imprinted onto a surface
, je tako močno vtisnjen v neko površino, da pusti sled.
